title: Michelada cocktail
description: Looking for a beer cocktail? The Michelada could be the answer. Itâ€™s a popular Latin-American cocktail known in Spanish as cerveza preparada (prepared beer).
ingredients: 1 ice-cold Mexican beer such as Corona

method.Step 1: Mix sea salt and chilli powder on a saucer, run a little lime juice around the rim of a glass, then dip into the chilli mix.

method.Step 2: Fill the glass with ice, add 2 tbsp lime juice, 2 dashes hot sauce, 1 dash soy sauce, 1 dash Worcestershire sauce and a pinch of pepper. Slowly pour in an ice-cold Mexican beer such as Corona. Decorate with lime wedges, stir and enjoy.
